title: Successful User Authentication
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate with valid credentials

title: Password Validation - Minimum Length
description: Verify that passwords shorter than 8 characters are rejected

title: Password Validation - Character Requirements
description: Verify that passwords without uppercase, lowercase, or number are rejected

title: Account Lockout After Failed Attempts
description: Verify that account is locked after three consecutive failed login attempts

title: Password Reset Link Expiration
description: Verify that password reset links expire after 24 hours

title: Session Timeout After Inactivity
description: Verify that user session times out after 30 minutes of inactivity

title: Data Export to CSV Format
description: Verify that user data can be exported in CSV format

title: Data Export Performance
description: Verify that data export completes within 5 minutes for 10,000 records
